other.text: Black tea preparation consists mainly of picking young leaves and leaf buds on a clear sunny day and letting the leaves dry for about an hour in the sun.

definition.zh_def: 由某些部分或成分組成或構成。
definition.en_def: To be made up of or composed of.
definition.example: The committee consists of five members.
